forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 13C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 56F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Foggy early, then partly cloudy later in the day. High 57F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low near 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low near 50F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 17C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: More clouds than sun. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 62F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low near 50F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 12C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 54F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 6C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 43F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High near 10C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High near 50F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 6C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 43F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High near 10C. SE winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 51F. SE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low around 5C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 41F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 11C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 53F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low around 5C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 42F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 12C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High 54F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low near 5C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low near 40F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 11C. S winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 52F. S winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low near 5C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 42F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early then becoming cloudy with periods of light rain later in the day. High 11C. ESE winds shifting to SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early then becoming cloudy with periods of light rain later in the day. High 52F. ESE winds shifting to SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low 6C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low 42F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
